children.title: Welcome
children.content:
# Welcome to Story Protocol Aeneid Testnet Documentation

This guide provides a comprehensive walkthrough for setting up your Story Protocol Aeneid Testnet node. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced user, you'll find detailed instructions for installation, configuration, validator setup, and maintenance.

## Quick Start
- Follow the [System Requirements](#-system-requirements) section to prepare your server.
- Install dependencies and build the node as outlined in the [Installation](#-installation) section.
- Configure and start your node using the [Configuration](#-configuration) and [Start Services](#-start-services) sections.
- Create a validator once synced as described in the [Validator Creation](#-validator-creation) section.

children.title: System Requirements
children.content:
## System Requirements

### Minimum Hardware Requirements
| Component | Minimum | Recommended |
|-----------|---------|-------------|
| **CPU** | 4 cores | 8 cores |
| **RAM** | 16 GB | 32 GB |
| **Storage** | 500 GB NVMe SSD | 1 TB NVMe SSD |
| **OS** | Ubuntu 22.04 LTS | Ubuntu 22.04 LTS |
| **Network** | 100 Mbps | 1 Gbps |

### Port Configuration (Dynamic based on your prefix)
| Service | Port Formula | Example (prefix=26) | Example (prefix=56) |
|---------|--------------|---------------------|---------------------|
| Story P2P | `${STORY_PORT}656` | 26656 | 56656 |
| Story RPC | `${STORY_PORT}657` | 26657 | 56657 |
| Story API | `${STORY_PORT}317` | 26317 | 56317 |

children.title: Installation
children.content:
## Installation

### Step 1: System Preparation
```bash
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y
sudo apt install -y curl git wget htop tmux build-essential jq make lz4 gcc unzip aria2
```

### Step 2: Install Go 1.22.11
```bash
cd $HOME
VER="1.22.11"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source ~/.bash_profile
go version
```

children.title: Cosmovisor Setup
children.content:
## Cosmovisor Setup

### Step 1: Install Cosmovisor
```bash
go install cosmossdk.io/tools/cosmovisor/cmd/cosmovisor@v1.6.0
cosmovisor version
```

children.title: Port Configuration
children.content:
## Port Configuration
```bash
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${STORY_PORT}317%g; s%:8551%:${STORY_PORT}551%g" $HOME/.story/story/config/story.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${STORY_PORT}658%g; s%:26657%:${STORY_PORT}657%g; s%:26656%:${STORY_PORT}656%g; s%^external_address = ""%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${STORY_PORT}656\"%; s%:26660%:${STORY_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.story/story/config/config.toml
```

children.title: Start Services
children.content:
## Start Services
```bash
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable story-geth story
sudo systemctl start story-geth
sleep 5
sudo systemctl start story
```

children.title: Validator Creation
children.content:
## Validator Creation

### Step 3: Create Validator
```bash
story validator create --stake 1024000000000000000000 --moniker "$STORY_MONIKER" --chain-id 1315 --unlocked=false --rpc "https://aeneid.storyrpc.io"
```

children.title: Upgrades & Maintenance
children.content:
## Upgrades & Maintenance

### Method 1: Build for Cosmovisor Auto-Upgrade
```bash
LATEST_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/piplabs/story/releases/latest | jq -r '.tag_name')
mkdir -p $HOME/.story/story/cosmovisor/upgrades/$LATEST_VERSION/bin
cp ./story $HOME/.story/story/cosmovisor/upgrades/$LATEST_VERSION/bin/
echo "{\"name\":\"$LATEST_VERSION\",\"time\":\"0001-01-01T00:00:00Z\",\"height\":$UPGRADE_HEIGHT}" > $HOME/.story/story/cosmovisor/upgrades/$LATEST_VERSION/upgrade-info.json
```

children.title: Troubleshooting
children.content:
## Troubleshooting

### Node Not Syncing
- Check peers: `curl localhost:${STORY_PORT}657/net_info | jq '.result.n_peers'`
- Restart services: `sudo systemctl restart story story-geth`
